idea-plugin.name: Taiga.io Tasks
idea-plugin.description: Enable the use of taiga.io as an IntelliJ task server.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.1.6 - Back to JDK 6 for the build platform

1.1.5 - The update task network config now uses the custom URL provided not the default.

1.1.4 - Fixed an issue where missing fields in the API response would cause a NPE to be thrown during json deserialization.
